comments:
I created a new project using Eclipse. Everything works fine. 

However, If i stop and restart the computer then Eclipse, i got the following 
message on .metadata/.log

!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Jan 31, 2003 16:29:02.315
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getRootURL(Main.java:812)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.processConfiguration(Main.java:727)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:702)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:539)
	at java.lang.VirtualMachine.invokeMain(VirtualMachine.java)
	at java.lang.VirtualMachine.main(VirtualMachine.java:88)

Since the message is not that clear, it is not easy to understand where is the 
problem.

Regards,
Dider.

PS: My config is Debian Woody upgraded to testing. Kernel 2.4.18.
BTW: I use IBMJava2-14 files for my JAVA_HOME

It seems the problem comes from the IBM virtual Machine 1.4 If I try the 1.3 
ones every thing seems Ok.
